value.title: StarCraft 2: BEST Game Of 2020?! (ByuN vs Serral)
value.excerpt: One of the best games of the year in StarCraft 2. An epic match of Zerg versus Terran between Serral and ByuN. Two previous world champions of the game. value.title: StarCraft 2: Clem's Terran vs Zerg is INSANE! (Solar vs Clem)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Solar and Clem. In this Terran versus Zerg we watch Clem take control of the early game, but Solar managed to stay alive and strikes back in the late game. value.title: StarCraft 2: Maru's INCREDIBLE Terran Mech! (Reynor vs Maru)
value.excerpt: Top level game of professional StarCraft 2 between Maru (Terran) and Reynor (Zerg). Reynor decides to go for a Brood Lord timing attack versus Maru's passive Terran Mech style. While most players would just lose the game rigth then and there, Maru somehow manages to stabilize and counter attack.  Support

value.title: StarCraft 2: The Honorable MACRO PROTOSS! (Reynor vs ShoWTimE)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of top level European StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Zerg) and ShoWTimE (Protoss). The new patch has made Zerg versus Protoss a far more interesting matchup. Reynor has always been mid-game focused, but how does ShoWTimE deal with the change in the meta?  ShoWTimE on Twitter: https://twitter.com/showtimesc2

value.excerpt: Professional best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2. In this series of games between Neeb and Scarlett we have a variety of strategies.
